title: Fix The Hoof
description: Fix The Hoof is a relaxing simulation game where you step into the role of a hoof specialist, cleaning and restoring the hooves of animals like horses, cows, and goats. Experience the most satisfying ASMR moments as you clean, polish, and paint hooves in this immersive 3D game. Collect money from your services to upgrade your farm and buy new animals to care for. Whether you're a fan of ASMR videos or simply seeking a stress-relieving activity, Fix The Hoof offers a therapeutic and enjoyable experience, letting you indulge in the oddly satisfying art of hoof care!
